str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of Hebrew origin; a separatist, i.e. Exclusively religious; a Pharisean, i.e. Jewish sectary.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
